resources.string: Here are your current tasks.

string-array.name: learn_current_tasks_nav_questions
string-array.item: How to create a new task?
How to complete the task?
How to delete a task?

string-array.name: learn_current_tasks_nav_answers
string-array.item: Click on the plus button in the lower right corner.
Swipe your currentTask to the left and click on the green button.
Swipe your currentTask to the right and click on the red button.

resources.string: This is a new task creation window.

string-array.name: learn_current_task_maker_questions
string-array.item: Where to enter text?
How to choose an icon?
How to set the notification?

string-array.name: learn_current_task_maker_answers
string-array.item: The text next to the icon of the task.
You choose not an icon, but a skill. The task icon will be the same as the selected skill.
You need to unlock the "Notifications" function. To do this, go to the inventory in the "Features" section and unlock the "Notifications" features.

resources.string: This is a window with detailed information about the current task.
Here are the repeatable tasks.

string-array.name: learn_copy_tasks_nav_questions
string-array.item: How to create a new repeatable task?
How they work?
How to see detailed information about it?

string-array.name: learn_copy_tasks_nav_answers
string-array.item: Press the plus button in the bottom right corner.
These tasks copy themselves at a certain time and create new current tasks.
Click on the task itself and a window with detailed information will open.

resources.string: This is the window for creating a new repeatable task.

string-array.name: learn_copy_task_maker_questions
string-array.item: What are autocreate days?
What are autocreate time?

string-array.name: learn_copy_task_maker_answers
string-array.item: Autocreate days are the days when new tasks will appear.
This is the time when the task appears on the selected days.

resources.string: This is a window with detailed information about the repeatable task.
Here are the completed tasks.
This window contains detailed information about the completed task.
Here are your skills.

string-array.name: learn_skills_nav_questions
string-array.item: How to create a skill?
Why do we need skills?
How to improve?

string-array.name: learn_skills_nav_answers
string-array.item: Press the plus button in the bottom right corner.
Skills are needed to improve them and to evaluate how you develop.
Perform tasks, choosing a skill that you want to improve.

resources.string: This is the window to create a new skill.

string-array.name: learn_skill_maker_questions
string-array.item: Where to enter text?
How to choose an icon?
What is an attribute?

string-array.name: learn_skill_maker_answers
string-array.item: The text next to the icon of the skill.
Click on the icon next to the name of the skill and choose what you want.
This is an attribute of the hero, which will be improved along with the skill.

resources.string: This is a window with detailed information about the skill.
Here are the achievements.

string-array.name: learn_achievement_nav_questions
string-array.item: How to see detailed information about it?

string-array.name: learn_achievement_nav_answers
string-array.item: Click on it and you will see the detailed information of achievement.

resources.string: This is a window with detailed information about the achievement.
Here is your hero.

string-array.name: learn_hero_nav_questions
string-array.item: Why would I need that?
Strength, intellect, creation… what is this?

string-array.name: learn_hero_nav_answers
string-array.item: The hero reflects you, you are the hero! If you perform tasks in life that you create here, then you and this hero will grow together in the same areas and skills!
These are attributes of the hero. They improve when skills improve.

resources.string: Here you can change the name, appearance and… gender of your hero.

string-array.name: learn_hero_maker_edit_questions
string-array.item: Don\'t worry, I won\'t change the gender.

string-array.name: learn_hero_maker_edit_answers
string-array.item: Good for you.

resources.string: Greetings you! First time here?

string-array.name: learn_hero_maker_create_questions
string-array.item: Yeah, it\'s my first time.
Have you forgotten me, old man?

string-array.name: learn_hero_maker_create_answers
string-array.item: Great! I\'m not going to immerse you in the details of this place yet. Now you just need to enter your name, choose the appearance and gender.
Ahem, I\'m not just any old man… I am the Creator! Well, do what you have to do, since you know everything.

resources.string: This is your inventory, here your hero can buy functions, costumes, themes, etc.

string-array.name: learn_inventory_nav_questions
string-array.item: Where are the costumes? I want a suit!

string-array.name: learn_inventory_nav_answers
string-array.item: The suit must be earned… or rather unlock. Open the tab "Costumes" and click on one of them.

resources.string: This is a window with product information.

string-array.name: learn_product_dialog_questions
string-array.item: How to unlock it?
After unlocking the product will remain forever?

string-array.name: learn_product_dialog_answers
string-array.item: You need to unlock all parts of the product.
Yes.

resources.string: This is my house, you can always come here and ask me something.
Greetings! You unlocked the attribute graph.

string-array.name: learn_unlock_attribute_graph_questions
string-array.item: Where to see?
Why would I need that?

string-array.name: learn_unlock_attribute_graph_answers
string-array.item: It is located in the hero tab next to the attributes.
This graph shows your strengths and weaknesses.

resources.string: Greetings! You unlocked the notifications. Now you can assign notifications to your current tasks.

string-array.name: learn_unlock_notifications_questions
string-array.item: Where to install them?

string-array.name: learn_unlock_notifications_answers
string-array.item: In the new currentTask window, click on "Add notification".

resources.string: Wow, you unlocked widget tasks! Now you can go to your phone\'s widget list, find a widget called "Task List" and install it on your screen!

string-array.name: learn_unlock_task_list_widget_questions
string-array.item: What is it?

string-array.name: learn_unlock_task_list_widget_answers
string-array.item: It will display your current tasks.

resources.string: You have unlocked repeatable tasks! This is a very powerful and useful feature. Now you can go to the second tab after the current tasks and there you can create a new repeatable task.

string-array.name: learn_unlock_copy_tasks_questions
string-array.item: What is a repeatable task?
Where are they?

string-array.name: learn_unlock_copy_tasks_answers
string-array.item: Repeatable tasks are tasks that automatically create a new current task on the same day of the week and the same time as they do.
Go to the second tab at the top next to the current tasks.

resources.string: Great, you made a hero! Do you have any questions for me?

string-array.name: learn_after_create_hero_questions
string-array.item: What kind of application is this?
Why are you making this app?

string-array.name: learn_after_create_hero_answers
string-array.item: It is gamified to-do list. Here you can improve your character and skills by completing tasks, as well as receive coins for this and spend them on new functions in the application!
I wanted to make a tool that would turn boring everyday tasks into interesting quests like RPG games.

resources.string: Here are your challenges.

string-array.name: learn_challenges_fragment_questions
string-array.item: What are they needed for?

string-array.name: learn_challenges_fragment_answers
string-array.item: If you want to create a new habit or get rid of the old one - challenge yourself!

resources.string: This is the window for creating a new challenge.

string-array.name: learn_challenge_maker_questions
string-array.item: How to choose an icon?

string-array.name: learn_challenge_maker_answers
string-array.item: Click on the icon next to the name of the challenge and choose which one you want.
